description: Juicy prawns, sweet pineapple and capsicum make these barbecue skewers a winner. Not to mention the sensational healthier seafood sauce to go with them.
name: Pineapple & Prawn Kebabs With Healthier Seafood Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 16 large green banana prawns, peeled, deveined, tails intact
0.5 pineapple, peeled, cored, cut into 3cm pieces
2 red capsicums, halved, deseeded, cut into 3cm pieces
1 red onion, thinly sliced into rounds
420g black beans no added salt, rinsed, drained
4 slices crusty grain bread, toasted (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Thread prawns, pineapple and capsicum, alternatively, on 8 small metal skewers. Spray with oil.
Preheat a large chargrill pan over high heat. Pierce tomatoes with a small knife. Cook tomato and skewers, turning, for 10 minutes or until prawns are cooked through and tomato is tender.
Meanwhile, place cabbage, onion, beans and lemon juice on a serving platter and toss to combine.
Place tomato, vinegar, oil, oregano and paprika in a blender and blitz until smooth. Arrange skewers over salad and serve with healthier seafood sauce, lemon wedges and bread.
